a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Homicide rate, by sex of the victim
Annual number of deaths from homicide per 100,000, for males and females. Countries above the diagonal line
have a higher male homicide rate, whereas countries below the line have a higher female homicide rate.
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (2025)
